name: simple_qr_code
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool custom_qr_code_with_logo_v2.
Tool description: Custom QR codes with a logo allow businesses to create personalized QR codes with their own brand logo integrated into the code. Try it today!
API description: Generates a simple QR code for the given link with optional color customization using the RapidAPI Toolbench service.

link.description: The URL that the QR code will direct to.

color.description: The color of the QR code in hexadecimal format. Default is None, which results in the default color (#000).
